name: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for requesting a car’s current power level.

items.name: func resolveCarName(for: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the name of the user’s car.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntent, completion: (INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can access the car’s power level.

items.name: func handle(intent: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntent, completion: (INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Accesses and returns the car’s current power level status.

items.name: func startSendingUpdates(for: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntent, to: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntentResponseObserver)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of regular power level updates for a particular electric vehicle.

items.name: func stopSendingUpdates(for: INGetCarPowerLevelStatusIntent)
items.desc: Stops the delivery of regular power level updates for a particular electric vehicle.
